column5: Well the morning wasnt looking good with all the rain but I had to get out so off we went .After sitting at the lake for an hour waiting for the rain to let up we finally got the boat in the water.We fished for a couple hours and didnt do to bad .We were worried the downpours and lightnig returning  so we fished the area pretty quick .Most were caught on senkos  and a couple on tubes on a variety of colours. Nice fish.  I suggest that when you link photos in your posts that are hosted on PhotBucket that you use the IMG CODE link so that the pic is actually shown in the thread and not just a clickable link.
Looks like you had a great day out there, nice way to start the season for sure! Thanks for sharing.  PS. water looked pretty high eh?
fishin with dad is the best
Thats some real nice sized bass for you & your dad !!!!!.  ..great pics as well,its always great to go out fishing with your old man,and to have a nice day of fishing as well !!!....cheers
Father and son fishing with lots of fish in the boat! Sounds like a day well spent.Thanks for sharing.
